attributes.action: You will be charged eighteen pounds a year. If you don.t pay your phone bill direct debit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This scandalous demand was introduced by
our Largest privatised telecom company
on the 1st May.
It will bear down most heavily on the poor and the elderly.Who do not have a bank account.If enough of us get together we will put a end to this disgraceful charge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
